ui5-inspector.name: UI5 Inspector
ui5-inspector.description: The UI5 Inspector is a standard Chrome extension for debugging and getting to know UI5 applications.

UI5CustomControl.name: OpenUI5 Custom Controls for charting
UI5CustomControl.description: This project shows how to use C3.js and Chart.js within OpenUI5 projects.

Meteor-UI5.name: Meteor-UI5
Meteor-UI5.description: Meteor-UI5 is a collection of packages that brings together two powerful open source JavaScript web frameworks: Meteor and OpenUI5.

openui5-i18n-util.name: openui5-i18n-util
openui5-i18n-util.description: This script will search all your i18n strings and build auto-magically every translations file for you.

Ui5Strap.name: Ui5Strap
Ui5Strap.description: App Development Toolkit for Desktop, Cloud and Mobile. Based on OpenUI5 + Bootstrap.

XMPPJSONPatchSyncModel.name: XMPPJSONPatchSyncModel
XMPPJSONPatchSyncModel.description: This OpenUI5 data model uses a node on an XMPP server to synchronize itself to different connected clients.

ui5-model-inspector.name: UI5 Interactive Model Inspector (Custom Control)
ui5-model-inspector.description: This custom control allows you to view (and modify) state of your client and server models for debugging and development.

ui5-schemas.name: ui5-schemas
ui5-schemas.description: UI5 Schemas allows you to develop SAPUI5/OpenUI5 XML at a maximum convenience. It downloads, upgrades and sets up SAPUI5/OpenUI5 XML schemas for a better development experience in your favorite IDE (if it is WebStorm ;).

ui5-CRUDModel.name: UI5 CRUDModel for php data services
ui5-CRUDModel.description: UI5 Model implementation which allows you to use a php Web server as a data service

ui5-jsx-rm.name: JSX to UI5 Babel Plugin
ui5-jsx-rm.description: A Babel plugin for converting JSX to UI5 render manager calls.

openui5-pwa-sample.name: openui5-pwa-sample
openui5-pwa-sample.description: The demo is a simple TODO list application. Add new tasks with the input field at the bottom of the screen. The tasks are stored locally and the application works online as well as offline without any difference.

openui5-generic-app-testing.name: OpenUI5 Generic App Testing
openui5-generic-app-testing.description: Generic App Testing is a client-side JavaScript library that uses the excellent OPA (One Page Acceptance) and Gherkin support already provided by OpenUI5 to allow UI5 app developers to write entire test scenarios in English language - without coding!

openui5-password.name: OpenUI5 Password
openui5-password.description: An OpenUI5 Control which checks your password strength and validates it.

openui5-validator.name: OpenUI5 Validator
openui5-validator.description: An OpenUI5 library to validate fields.

openui5-tour.name: OpenUI5 Tour
openui5-tour.description: OpenUI5 Tour enables an user-friendly way to showcase products and features in your website.

grunt-nwabap-ui5uploader.name: grunt-nwabap-ui5uploader
grunt-nwabap-ui5uploader.description: A Grunt plugin to upload UI5 sources to a SAP NetWeaver ABAP system.

UI5Lab.name: ui5lab
UI5Lab.description: UI5Lab is a community driven project to establish a repository for UI5 Custom Control Libraries. It is meant to enable everyone to use UI5 Custom Controls easily.

ui5-codecompletion.name: ui5-codecompletion
ui5-codecompletion.description: node module (CLI) to configure WebStorm with UI5 code completion in *.js files

yii2-openui5.name: yii2-openui5
yii2-openui5.description: Yii2-openui5 is extension for Yii2 Framework to integrate with OpenUI5.

openui5-parallax.name: OpenUI5 Parallax
openui5-parallax.description: A library wrapping parallax.js in UI5 controls to create stunning layered effects

expressui5.name: Express UI5
expressui5.description: CLI tool to create ui5 projects quickly from developer maintained templates.

oui5lib.name: OpenUI5 Library
oui5lib.description: Library to speed up development with OpenUI5. Includes UIComponent generator.
